Package org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.alt

Class Summary
AAConverter This class is used to do conversions between different alternating automata, or between alternating automaton and finite automaton.
AAConverter.CNFABW2NBWConverter  
AbstractAltAutomaton An AbstractAltAutomaton is a structure for automata with alternation which can be in DNF form or CNF form.
AbstractAltAutomatonCreator This is an abstract creator for creating alternating automata with propositional alphabet and labels on transitions.
AltAutomaton An AltAutomaton is an alternating automaton which can be in DNF form or CNF form.
AltConnector An AltConnector has type State but acts as a connector in an alternating automaton.
AltState An AltState is a state of an alternating automaton.
AltStyleConversion This class provides a conversion from an alternating automaton in DNF (or CNF) to an alternating automaton in CNF (or DNF respectively).
AltTransition An AltTransition is a transition in an alternating automaton.
CNFNABWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating Büchi word automaton (NABW) in CNF form.
CNFNACWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating co-Büchi word automaton (NACW) in CNF form.
CNFNAGBWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating generalized Büchi word automaton (NAGBW) in CNF form.
CNFNAMWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating Muller word automaton (NAMW) in CNF form.
CNFNAPWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating parity word automaton (NAPW) in CNF form.
CNFNARWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating Rabin word automaton (NARW) in CNF form.
CNFNASWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating Streett word automaton (NASW) in CNF form.
DNFNABW2NBW This class implements the conversion from NABW in DNF to equivalent NBW [Satoru Miyano, Takeshi Hayashi: Alternating Finite Automata on ω-Words.
DNFNABWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating Büchi word automaton (NABW) in DNF form.
DNFNACWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating co-Büchi word automaton (NACW) in DNF form.
DNFNAGBWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating generalized Büchi word automaton (NAGBW) in DNF form.
DNFNAMWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating Muller word automaton (NAMW) in DNF form.
DNFNAPWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating parity word automaton (NAPW) in DNF form.
DNFNARWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating Rabin word automaton (NARW) in DNF form.
DNFNASWCreator This is a creator that can create a nondeterministic alternating Streett word automaton (NASW) in DNF form.
 

Enum Summary
AltStyle An AltStyle defines the styles of alternating automata.
